baseprompt:
Can you turn the synopsis into a full script. 
The script should be very detailed, including character descriptions and scene descriptions. It should be long enough for a 10 minute short movie. 
From the script also generate a storyboard and a set of prompts for generating images for the storyboard. 
The storyboard should be a detailed description of each main scene in the movie. 
Include character names and descriptions, with character actions and scene settings. 
The main character from the script should be in every storyboard cell. 
Describe the age, hairstyle, hair color and build of the main character in every storyboard panel. 
The main characters hair and build should be consistent or at least smoothly transition from one storyboard cell to the next.
There should be at least 25 cells in the storyboard. 
The image prompts should be a list of prompts for generating images for each cell in the storyboard. 
They should be clear enough to identify which is the main character in the scene. 
If there are multiple people in the scene clearly identify the main character. 
You must describe the age, hairstyle, hair color and build of the main character in every image prompt. 
The main characters hair and build should be consistent or at least smoothly transition from one image to the next. 
He should not go from balding to hairy from one image to the next. 
Do not create montage images. 
All images should be in color. 
All generated image prompts should be safe so they would not be rejected by openais safety system. 
Respond as a json response with the following keys: 

 1. script: The full script for the short movie.
 2. storyboard: The storyboard for the short movie. 
 3. image_prompts: The image prompts for the storyboard.

 The synopsis is as follows:
prompt:
From a small child, Colin loved travelling and exploring.
He was always a bit overweight and looked dishevelled with his scruffy mousey blonde hair.
Whether exploring his back garden, to escaping from his house and exploring his local neighborhood in Liverpool, Colin just loved to travel.
As he grew, he explored further afield, Manchester, Edinburgh and London.
When he hit adulthood, he decided to travel the world.
As he aged, he got balder and greyer.
He bought a hot air balloon and went travelling across Europe, visiting all the major capitals.
He then continued across Asia.
He cross the Pacific, visiting all the major cities in the United States before landing in Canada.
He is now happily settled in Vancouver Canada enjoying his life at home.
base_image_prompt:

Use the uploaded image as a reference image for the main character in the description. 
If there is no person in the first image, use the second image as a reference image for the main character in the description. 
Keep the person from the reference image main facial features so they remain recognizable as them when implanted into the generated image. 
Age the person to match the description of the scene.
Adjust the persons hair to match the description in the scene. 
If the person in the reference image is wearing any headgear such as a hat or spectacles, then please try and keep it during image generation. 
Do not add text to the images unless prompt specifically asks.
